### Functions We Need

```{r}
roll_one_die <- function() {
  sample(x = 1:6, size = 1)
}

roll_two_die <- function() {
  roll_one_die() + roll_one_die()
}

# the tilda tells the function to run the list 1:10 over the function

map_int(1:10, ~ roll_two_die())
```
